pageSetting.title: 行员绩效提留金额明细查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select yyjg.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,fapz.famc,khzb.khzbmc,yyjg.tlje from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khfa_fapz fapz on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(yyjg.tjrq,2,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select yyjg.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,fapz.famc,khzb.khzbmc,yyjg.tlje from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khfa_fapz fapz on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(yyjg.tjrq,2,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$ ) t
